example.eg: The birthday present was just what she wanted.
example.egtrans: 那个生日礼物正合她所需。

example.eg: This paragraph is in past tense, but that paragraph is all in present.
example.egtrans: to be的第一人称单数现在时是"am"。

example.eg: Try to stop worrying about tomorrow and keep your thoughts in the present.
example.egtrans: 专心过好现在，不要总是为明天担心。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现在, 当下, 目前

example.eg: The company director thanked all those present for making the conference a success.
example.egtrans: 公司总裁感谢了所有让会议圆满成功的与会者。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出席的, 在场的, 与会的

example.eg: It is essential that the entire team be present at this meeting.
example.egtrans: 全队都出席这场会议至关重要。

example.eg: At the present moment, we don't need anything.
example.egtrans: 当下，我们什么都不需要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现在的, 当下的, 此刻的

example.eg: Dad, allow me to present my boss, Mr. Smith.
example.egtrans: 爸爸，让我向你介绍一下我的老板，史密斯先生。

example.eg: Governor, may I present Mr. Johnson to you?
example.egtrans: 州长阁下，我可以向您引见约翰逊先生吗？

example.eg: The previous year's winner presented the award.
example.egtrans: 鉴于他多年的服务，他们赠予了他一只金表。

example.eg: It gives me great pleasure to present this award to you.
example.egtrans: 我很荣幸把这份奖项授予你。

example.eg: With the failures of past governors constantly present in his mind, the politician vowed to do better.
example.egtrans: 过去诸位执政者的失败总是在他脑海中萦绕，挥之不去。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 存在（于头脑中）的，萦绕（于头脑中）的

example.eg: Wild buffalo are no longer present in North America.
example.egtrans: 野生水牛已经在北美绝迹。

example.eg: The patient presented with a sore throat and runny nose.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 呈现症状, 出现病症

example.eg: We now present our musical extravaganza!
Allow me to present my findings.
The museum plans to present the new statue as part of an upcoming exhibit.
The vendor presents his invoice weekly.
The district attorney presented charges of assault.
For his years of service, they presented him with a gold watch.
example.egtrans: 由于他长年累月的效力，他们赠予他一块金表。

example.eg: They presented a bouquet of flowers to the winner.
He presented his plan to increase sales to his co-workers.
example.egtrans: 他向同事们介绍增加销量的计划。

example.eg: We are proud to present the play "Hamlet" to you tonight.
example.egtrans: 今晚，我们很荣幸为各位呈上戏剧《哈姆雷特》。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向某人提供某物, 向某人展示某物

example.eg: At present, there are six students enrolled in the phonetics course.
example.egtrans: 目前，有六名学生报名注册了语音学课程。

example.eg: At the present time, there are many migrating birds here.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 目前, 现在, 当前

example.eg: The family spent Christmas Eve wrapping their Christmas presents.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现在分词, 在座诸位除外, 在座各位除外

example.eg: "I am writing a sentence" is an example of the present continuous tense.
The historian was only interested in the past and not at all in tune with the present day.
Present-day medicine uses a lot of sophisticated equipment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 当代的, 现代的, 当今的

example.eg: In English, you use the present participle to form continuous tenses.

dsense.name: present perfect
dsense.guideword: (tense: have been doing, etc.) (语法现象)

example.eg: The present perfect is used for situations that began in the past and have continued until the present.

dsense.name: present perfect tense, present perfect
dsense.guideword: (grammar: have been, etc.) (语法结构为：have + 过去分词)

example.eg: In this exercise, students have to decide whether to use the present perfect tense or the past simple tense.
The present simple is one of the first tenses which students are taught when they are learning English.
In this lesson, the students learn how to use the present tense.
The present value of many homes has dropped considerably during the housing bust.
Graham likes to present himself as a highly educated person.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 呈现自己, 展现自己

example.eg: Make sure that you present yourself with confidence.
I've worked for six weeks but haven't been paid up to the present.
